AI Description: Trinity is a de novo RNA-Seq assembly software that reconstructs transcriptomes from short RNA-Seq reads using a novel method for de novo transcriptome assembly from RNA-Seq data. It combines efficient full-length transcript assembly and full-length isoform reconstruction to result in high-sensitivity and high-accuracy transcriptomes.
Core Features: De Novo Transcriptome Assembly, RNA-Seq Data Analysis, Isoform Expression Quantification, Gene Fusion Detection, Chimeric Transcript Identification
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, Transcriptomics, RNA-Seq, De Novo Assembly
